web.title: Basic Package: Starter Site
web.blurb: Get your digital presence up and running with my Starter Site package. Perfect for small businesses and individuals looking for a professional website without breaking the bank. You'll enjoy a beautifully designed, responsive website that covers all the essentials.
features: 4-5 Pages
Responsive Design
Basic SEO
Contact Form Integration

web.title: Standard Package: Business Site
web.blurb: Elevate your online presence with my Business Website package. Tailored for small to medium-sized businesses, this package offers a comprehensive solution to showcase your offerings, engage your audience, and establish credibility in the digital space.
features: Suitable for small to medium-sized businesses
6-10 pages (Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Testimonials, Blog, Contact, etc.)
Responsive design with attention to user experience
Custom domain setup and email integration
Advanced SEO optimization
Social media integration
Basic content management system (CMS)
1 year of free upkeep and support

web.title: Premium Package: E-Commerce Site
web.blurb: Ready to take your business to the next level? My E-Commerce Site package is designed for businesses looking to sell products online. This package includes all the features you need to create a seamless shopping experience for your customers and boost your online sales.
features: Designed for businesses looking to sell products online
10+ pages (Home, About, Products/Services, Blog, Contact, etc.)
E-commerce functionality with product listings, cart, and checkout
Payment gateway integration (Paypal, Stripe, etc)
Inventory Management
Advanced SEO and conversion optimization
Content management system with product management capabilities
1 year of free upkeep and support

web.title: Add-Ons (Flat Rate)
web.blurb: Enhance your chosen package with these add-ons to tailor your website exactly to your needs. Mix and match to create a unique online presence that reflects your brand and engages your audience.
features: **Additional Web Pages ($50/Page):** Extend your website's reach with extra pages tailored to your content. Perfect for expanding your offerings, showcasing projects, or sharing valuable information.
**Blog Setup ($150):** Establish yourself as an industry authority with a dedicated blog section. Share insights, updates, and valuable content to engage your visitors and improve your SEO.
**Advanced SEO Audit And Implementation ($200):** Boost your website's visibility with an in-depth SEO analysis and optimization. Reach more potential clients and improve your search engine rankings.

**Additional Year Of Upkeep And Support ($100-250/Year):** Extend the peace of mind that comes with my upkeep and support services for an additional year. I'm here to ensure your website stays updated and functional.

app.title: Basic Package: Simple Mobile App
app.blurb: Introducing my Simple Mobile App package, perfect for startups and individuals looking to make their mark in the app world. With a focus on essential features, you'll have a user-friendly app that delivers your message and engages your audience.
features: Ideal for startups and individuals looking for a basic app presence
Single-platform development (iOS or Android)
Up to 5 screens
Basic UI/UX design
App functionality: Contact information, simple forms, basic features
App store submission assistance
1 year of free upkeep and support

app.title: Standard Package: Multi-Platform App
app.blurb: Elevate your app presence with my Multi-Platform App package, designed for businesses that want to reach audiences on both iOS and Android. This package offers enhanced functionality, a polished user experience, and the opportunity to connect with a broader user base.
features: Suitable for businesses seeking a presence on both iOS and Android platforms
Up to 10 screens
Enhanced UI/UX design
App functionality: User registration/login, basic database integration, interactive elements
Push notification integration
App store submission assistance
1 year of free upkeep and support

app.title: Premium Package: Enhanced App Experience
app.blurb: Experience the epitome of app excellence with my Enhanced App Experience package. Crafted for businesses seeking a standout app, this package combines advanced features, custom design, and cutting-edge technology to deliver an app that's both powerful and captivating.
features: Designed for businesses requiring a more sophisticated app experience
Up to 20 screens
Custom UI/UX design with attention to user flows
App functionality: User authentication, in-app purchases, advanced database integration, API integration
Advanced features: Maps integration, social media sharing, multimedia content
Push notification integration
App store submission assistance
1 year of free upkeep and support

app.title: Add-Ons (Flat Rate)
app.blurb: Enhance your chosen app package with these valuable add-ons. Tailor your app to meet your specific needs and create a truly remarkable mobile experience.
features: **Additional Screens ($100/Screen):** Extend your app's functionalitywith extra screens. Perfect for adding more features, showcasing content, or enhancing user interactions.
**Custom Graphics And Branding ($200):** Ensure your app's visual identity aligns with your brand. Custom graphics and branding elements create a consistent and memorable user experience.

**Backend Development And API Integration ($300-500):** Connect your app to the backend for seamless data management and integration with external services. Unlock advanced features and functionalities.
**In-App Purchases Setup ($150):** Monetize your app by offering in-app purchases. This add-on enables you to generate revenue while providing value to your users.
**Push Notification Service Integration ($100):** Keep your users engaged with timely notifications. This integration lets you reach your audience even when they're not actively using your app.

**Additional Year Of Upkeep And Support ($200-400/Year):** Extend the assurance of my upkeep and support services for another year. I'm committed to keeping your app up-to-date and performing at its best.
